main event: High school students observed a triangular shaped object with unusual lights over the James River, Virginia, for about 20 minutes.
interesting points: The object had a triangular shape with a white light at the apex and orange and white lights on the base corners., The object approached within 3/4 mile of the observers without making any sound or leaving a trail., The sighting took place on a night with low visibility and overcast conditions., The observers, five high school students, used binoculars to view the object., A barge was the only vessel present on the water during the sighting time.
sighted object: triangular shaped object with unusual lights
